abstract: The social networking company that tracks trends through individuals’ updates may go to the stock market for financing if necessary, Biz Stone said.
snippet: The social networking company that tracks trends through individuals’ updates may go to the stock market for financing if necessary, Biz Stone said.
lead_paragraph: Twitter, the social network built on 140-character musings, may eventually go to the stock market for financing, but it is currently ruling out a sale, Biz Stone, a founder, said on Monday.

headline.main: Twitter May Seek I.P.O., but No Sale, Founder Says
